charges.charge_description: 18:13 (CPC 417(a)(2))-Drawing and exhibiting a firearm in a rude, angry and threatening manner. (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is placed on two (2) years probation. The defendant will pay a fine in the amount of $200.00 and a Special Assessment Fee of $20.00. (1s)

charges.charge_description: 18:13 (36 CR 261.10(d)) Discharging firearm within 150 yards of campsite. (2s)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is placed on two (2) years probation. The defendant will pay a fine in the amount of $200.00 and a Special Assessment Fee of $20.00. (2s)

charges.charge_description: Count 1: 18:13 (C.P.C. 417) Drawing, exhibiting, or using firearm. Count 2: 18:13 (C.P.C. 12025) Carrying weapon concealed within vehicle or on person. Count 3: 18:13 36 CFR 261, Part 261, Section 10(d)-Discharging a firearm or any other implement capable of taking human life, causing injury, or damaging property. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Count two in the original Information is dismissed by motion of Government. (2)
